dragonchild.name: Dragon Child
dragonchild.desc: A descendant of a line of dragons going back to ancient days. Can use swords unique to the Divine Dragon.

divinedragon.name: Divine Dragon
divinedragon.desc: Keeper of the power of the great reigning dragon. Uses Divine Dragon swords and martial arts.

fellchildveyle.name: Fell Child (Veyle)
fellchildveyle.desc: Inheritor of the blood of the Fell Dragon. Excels in Fell skills and powerful dark magic.

fellchildenemy.name: Fell Child (Enemy)
fellchildenemy.desc: Mindless minion of the Fell Dragon. Uses powerful sword techniques.

fellmonarch.name: Fell Monarch
fellmonarch.desc: One who seeks to rule the world as a tyrant. Wields the dark arts to cause maximum destruction.

greatfelldragon.name: Great Fell Dragon
greatfelldragon.desc: The Fell Dragon wielding the power of the Emblem Rings. Capable now of opening a gate to another world.

noblealfred.name: Noble (Alfred)
noblealfred.desc: One born into a noble royal family. A proficient horseman and skilled lancer.

avenir.name: Avenir
avenir.desc: A dashing prince who rides a white horse into battle. Excels with a lance and serviceable with a blade.

nobleceline.name: Noble (Celine)
nobleceline.desc: One born into a noble royal family. A proficient magic user who is also serviceable with a sword.

vidame.name: Vidame
vidame.desc: Magic-wielding swordswoman who can cut through enemy mages. She is also capable of wielding staves.

lorddiamant.name: Lord (Diamant)
lorddiamant.desc: One born into a family that leads a nation. Proficient with a sword.

successeur.name: Successeur
successeur.desc: One with the will and strength to lead a nation. Skilled with both the blade and the axe.

lordalcryst.name: Lord (Alcryst)
lordalcryst.desc: One born into a family that leads a nation. Proficient with a bow.

tireurdelite.name: Tireur d'élite
tireurdelite.desc: An archer gifted with incredible aim. Each shot can eliminate a foe.

wingtamerivy.name: Wing Tamer (Ivy)
wingtamerivy.desc: A knight who has a rapport with beasts. Rides a wyvern into battle and uses magic and staves.

lindwurm.name: Lindwurm
lindwurm.desc: A magic-using wyvern rider who destroys enemies from above. Can use powerful magic and staves.

wingtamerhortensia.name: Wing Tamer (Hortensia)
wingtamerhortensia.desc: A knight who has a rapport with beasts. Rides a pegasus into battle and is skilled with tome and staff.

sleipnirrider.name: Sleipnir Rider
sleipnirrider.desc: A knight who rides the charming pegasus Sleipnir. Uses powerful staves and is skilled with tomes.

sentineltimerra.name: Sentinel (Timerra)
sentineltimerra.desc: A Sentinel who takes up arms to defend her nation. Proficient with the lance.

picket.name: Picket
picket.desc: A lancer who pierces the enemy lines with flawless skill. Her bouncy steps presage deadly attacks.

sentinelfogado.name: Sentinel (Fogado)
sentinelfogado.desc: A Sentinel who takes up arms to defend his nation. A proficient rider and archer.

cupido.name: Cupido
cupido.desc: A charming bow knight who fights with casual flair. Skilled with both bow and sword, he toys with his foe.

melusineenemy.name: Melusine (Enemy)
melusineenemy.desc: An alluring magic knight who rides an evil dragon. Overpowers with highly honed magic and sword skills.

swordfighter.name: Sword Fighter
swordfighter.desc: Footsoldiers who take pride in their skill with a blade. They avoid enemy attacks with nimble footwork.

swordmaster.name: Swordmaster
swordmaster.desc: Master sword fighters who avoid attacks by a hair's breadth and retaliate with mighty skills.

hero.name: Hero
hero.desc: Accomplished veterans proficient in several weapons and can easily cut through the front lines.

lancefighter.name: Lance Fighter
lancefighter.desc: Soldiers who fight with a lance. They strike just the right balance between offense and defense.

halberdier.name: Halberdier
halberdier.desc: Lance-wielders with a great deal of battlefield experience. Several cuts above common lance fighters.

royalknight.name: Royal Knight
royalknight.desc: Noble knights who tear across the battlefield on horseback, rallying their allies. They can also use staves.

axefighter.name: Axe Fighter
axefighter.desc: Proven warriors with an axe. Their swings are fierce, but leave them open to retaliation.

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.desc: Mighty warriors of unparalleled strength. They cleave foes in twain with huge axes.

warrior.name: Warrior
warrior.desc: Skilled experts in annihilating their enemies. They are capable with bows as well as axes.

archer.name: Archer
archer.desc: Light infantry who fight with a bow. They can attack from a distance.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.desc: Masters of the bow who target their foes' weak points with precision strikes.

bowknight.name: Bow Knight
bowknight.desc: Bow users that fire from the saddle and outflank foes with high mobility.

swordarmor.name: Sword Armor
swordarmor.desc: Heavily armored sword fighters clad in tough armor. They have high defense, but magic is their bane.

lancearmor.name: Lance Armor
lancearmor.desc: Heavily armored lancers clad in tough armor. They have high defense, but magic is their bane.

axearmor.name: Axe Armor
axearmor.desc: Heavily armored axe-wielders clad in tough armor. They have high defense, but magic is their bane.

general.name: General
general.desc: Heavily armored fighters boasting both an impenetrable defense and a fearsome offense.

greatknight.name: Great Knight
greatknight.desc: Heavily armored knights clad in thick armor. They defend their allies with a variety of weapons.

swordcavalier.name: Sword Cavalier
swordcavalier.desc: Sword-wielding knights who ride freely about the battlefield. They strike a good balance of skills.

lancecavalier.name: Lance Cavalier
lancecavalier.desc: Lance-wielding knights who ride freely about the battlefield. They strike a good balance of skills.

axecavalier.name: Axe Cavalier
axecavalier.desc: Axe-wielding knights who ride freely about the battlefield. They strike a good balance of skills.

paladin.name: Paladin
paladin.desc: High-ranking knights with a wealth of experience. Highly mobile and strong against magic.

wolfknight.name: Wolf Knight
wolfknight.desc: Knights who dart over the battlefield mounted on wolves. Their knife strikes are the ruin of enemy camps.

mage.name: Mage
mage.desc: Magic users who cast spells from tomes. Strong against enemies with high defense.

sage.name: Sage
sage.desc: Experienced mages who can call upon great power. Capable of using both tomes and staves.

mageknight.name: Mage Knight
mageknight.desc: Magic knights who cast spells from horseback, but can also take part in melee combat.

martialmonk.name: Martial Monk
martialmonk.desc: Combat monks who use staves to heal wounded allies. They are versed in the martial arts of self-defense.

martialmaster.name: Martial Master
martialmaster.desc: Experienced monks trained in the martial arts. They excel at hand-to- hand combat as well as healing.

highpriest.name: High Priest
highpriest.desc: Masters of staves with wisdom from experience. Their healing powers are lifesaving in battle.

swordflier.name: Sword Flier
swordflier.desc: Sword fighters who soar through the sky on their pegasus mounts. Strong against magic, but weak to bows.

lanceflier.name: Lance Flier
lanceflier.desc: Lance users who soar through the sky on their pegasus mounts. Strong against magic, but weak to bows.

axeflier.name: Axe Flier
axeflier.desc: Axe-wielders who soar through the sky on their pegasus mounts. Strong against magic, but weak to bows.

griffinknight.name: Griffin Knight
griffinknight.desc: Experienced knights who fly through the skies on a griffin. They are well- balanced and can use staves.

wyvernknight.name: Wyvern Knight
wyvernknight.desc: Experienced knights who fly through the skies on wyverns. Though powerful, they fear bows and magic.

thief.name: Thief
thief.desc: Burglars with a talent for picking locks. They are nimble with their hands and deadly with a knife.

dancer.name: Dancer
dancer.desc: Charming performers who can raise an ally's spirits, allowing the ally to act once more in battle.

barbarian.name: Barbarian
barbarian.desc: Fierce fighters with an insatiable rage. They possess great strength and speed, but little defense.

corruptedwyrm.name: Corrupted Wyrm
corruptedwyrm.desc: Minions of the Fell Dragon who aim to bring the world to ruin. Their dark breath destroys all.

phantomwyrm.name: Phantom Wyrm
phantomwyrm.desc: Enormous draconic minions. Though they are slow, their breath can affect faraway enemies.

villager.name: Villager
villager.desc: An ordinary person with no combat training.

emblem.name: Emblem
emblem.desc: Heroes from worlds beyond Elyos, who are contained in rings. They possess unimaginable power.

melusine.name: Melusine
melusine.desc: An alluring magic knight who rides an evil dragon. Overpowers with highly honed magic and sword skills.

enchanter.name: Enchanter
enchanter.desc: A combat medic who skillfully uses items for combat. Can use convoy, and excels at ally-support tactics.

corruptedwolf.name: Corrupted Wolf
corruptedwolf.desc: Minions of the Fell Dragon who aim to bring the world to ruin. They attack foes with cursed fangs.

phantomwolf.name: Phantom Wolf
phantomwolf.desc: Wolves that move swiftly around the battlefield. They confound their foes as they lash out with cursed fangs.

corruptedwyvern.name: Corrupted Wyvern
corruptedwyvern.desc: Minions of the Fell Dragon who aim to bring the world to ruin. They mow down foes with vile breath attacks.

phantomwyvern.name: Phantom Wyvern
phantomwyvern.desc: Wyverns that soar freely over the battlefield. They can corner enemies with breath attacks.

fellchildnel.name: Fell Child (Nel)
fellchildnel.desc: Inheritor of the blood of the Fell Dragon. Fights with a lance and uses a dragonstone to become a dragon.

fellchildrafal.name: Fell Child (Rafal)
fellchildrafal.desc: Inheritor of the blood of the Fell Dragon. Fights with an axe and uses a dragonstone to become a dragon.

magecannoneer.name: Mage Cannoneer
magecannoneer.desc: An armored foot soldier equipped with a handheld cannon. Launches ranged attacks.
